body.p: Additionally, Mr Zhang is concerned about the complexity and potential for misapplication of the dual lessor accounting model. Mr Zhang acknowledges that this dual model is consistent with the requirements in IAS 17. However, Mr Zhang notes that one of the biggest criticisms of IAS 17 was the potential for complexity and structuring inherent in a dual model. Mr Zhang believes that two transactions that are economically the same could be structured in a way that results in those transactions being accounted for differently under the dual lessor accounting model.
